author: Unreal Engine
description:
Dive into a new Unreal Engine sample that provides a fully designed, animated, and rigged project covering a range of broadcast artist workflows. 

Whether you’re a motion designer, a livestreamer, or just dabbling in motion graphics, this project is for you.  

Download the Sports Broadcast Motion Design Sample project on Fab: https://www.fab.com/listings/a7a18cf4-1020-4d84-921f-949b8c9233e9
Motion Design Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZlv_N0_O1gYGS8cv2klwuXTS3jexSJox

#MotionDesign #UnrealEngine #SampleProject
title: Sports Broadcast Motion Design Sample | Unreal Engine
